typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		title as string,
		year as string,
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: true,
	throughput: 2000) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(instr(title, 'Story') != 0)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		title as string,
		year as string,
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/title'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
